plist.dict:
CFBundleDevelopmentRegion $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE) CFBundleDisplayName Etron Flutter CFBundleExecutable $(EXECUTABLE_NAME) CFBundleIdentifier $(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER) CFBundleInfoDictionaryVersion 6.0 CFBundleName etron_flutter CFBundlePackageType APPL CFBundleShortVersionString $(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME) CFBundleVersion $(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER) LSRequiresIPhoneOS
UILaunchStoryboardName LaunchScreen
UISupportedInterfaceOrientations
UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait
UISupportedInterfaceOrientations~ipad
UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait
CADisableMinimumFrameDurationOnPhone
UIApplicationSupportsIndirectInputEvents
<key:NSCameraUsageDescription This app requires camera access to scan or capture photos. <key:NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription This app needs access to your photo library to select images. <key:NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription This app needs permission to save images to your photo library. <key:NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription This app uses your location to find nearby charging stations.
LSApplicationQueriesSchemes
http https
NSAppTransportSecurity
NSAllowsArbitraryLoads
NSAllowsArbitraryLoadsInWebContent
NSAllowsLocalNetworking
NSExceptionDomains
localhost
NSTemporaryExceptionAllowsInsecureHTTPLoads
NSTemporaryExceptionMinimumTLSVersion TLSv1.0
10.0.2.2
NSTemporaryExceptionAllowsInsecureHTTPLoads
NSTemporaryExceptionMinimumTLSVersion TLSv1.0 NSIncludesSubdomains
UIViewControllerBasedStatusBarAppearance
